code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{PrettyChatWindow}from"react-chat-engine-pretty";import{ChatEngineWrapper,ChatSocket,ChatFeed}from'react-chat-engine';import'./ChatComponent.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ChatComponent=()=>{const[filterValue,setFilterValue]=useState('');useEffect(()=>{const handleFilterInput=event=>{setFilterValue(event.target.value.toLowerCase().trim());};document.getElementById("filterInput").addEventListener("input",handleFilterInput);return()=>{document.getElementById("filterInput").removeEventListener("input",handleFilterInput);};},[]);const filterChatCards=()=>{const cards=document.querySelectorAll(".ce-chat-card");cards.forEach(card=>{const title=card.querySelector(".ce-chat-card-title").textContent.toLowerCase().trim();if(title.includes(filterValue)){card.classList.remove('hidden');}else{card.classList.add('hidden');}});};useEffect(()=>{filterChatCards();},[filterValue]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{style:{height:'100vh',width:'100vw'},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ce-chat-list",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",id:"filterInput",placeholder:"Type to filter"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PrettyChatWindow,{offset:3,height:"100vh",width:"50vh",username:window.username,secret:window.secret,projectId:"f0e1d373-0995-4a51-a2df-cf314fc0e034",style:{height:'100%'}})]});};export default ChatComponent;
